version_description:
Thank you for thousands of downloads and all your helpful feedback! I read every email and this is an update which includes some suggestions from you:

- Badge Count improvements: The step count should update more frequently now, but please note that due to iOS restrictions it is not possible to make it update live and it might still update infrequently at times. Nothing I can do about it, sorry.

- Chart improvements: Tap on the chart to see the distance travelled.

- Bug fixes

If you like Stepz, please let me know by leaving a review at the App Store or by sending an email. Thanks :)

Thank you very much for using Stepz! This is a mega update with lots of new stuff :)

- Dashboard stats row: All your important data for the day in one place. You can reorder the stats row in the settings
- Automatic goal: Stepz recalculates your daily steps goal based on your 7-day average (turned off by default)
- Apple Health integration: import your steps & climbed floors
- Better calories estimate based on your weight
- Climbed floors (iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus only)
- 5 new languages
- Design & usability improvements
- Bug fixes & performance improvements

Please let me know what you think about this update. I am determined to make Stepz the best pedometer app out there. So please send me your feedback, so I can improve the app even more.

If you like Stepz, let everybody know by leaving a review at the App Store. Thanks! :)

Michael

Thanks for using Stepz! This update has some cool new stuff for you:

- Hourly step values: Swipe left on the main chart to see how much you have moved throughout the day! Tap & hold to get details for every hour.

- Daily stats: Go through all your recorded days on the dashboard!

- Sharing: Tap on the share button on the dashboard to get an ad-free screenshot of Stepz that you can share on your social network of choice!

- Total steps & distance: You want it, you get it! Swipe through the stats row on the dashboard to see how much you have moved in total. Tip: You can reorder the stats in the settings.

- Improved CSV import & export: It's your data and getting it out of the app is even easier now.

- iOS 7.1 required from now on: Please update your devices if possible, iOS 8 is quite nice :)

- Bug fixes (thanks for reporting bugs, you are awesome!)

Please let me know what you think about the new version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting me directly at mail@stepzapp.com

Btw, you can expect a new update soon. It may or may not have to do something with the upcoming, revolutionary time keeping device from our favorite company ;)

Michael

Thanks for using Stepz! This is a small bug fix update.

Please let me know what you think about the new Stepz 1.5 version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting me directly at mail@stepzapp.com

Michael

Stepz 2.0 is here! This update brings you the brand new Stepz Friends feature:

- Connect with your friends and see each others steps
- See who makes the most steps and get motivated
- The stats view has been moved to the history view (top left button)

Please let us know what you think about the new version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting us directly via the app. Thanks! :)

Michael

This is a bug fix update with under-the-hood improvements for Stepz Friends. We recoded the whole architecture for better performance and stability. This will ensure that we can build cool new features on top of that more easily in the future.

Inactive friends:
During the transition period, we will show users that have not yet updated to the latest app version as inactive. Once you sign in with your login credentials or via Facebook, your account will be fully migrated to the new system. If you have friends or family members that also use Stepz Friends, please let them know to update the app, so you can see each others steps again.

If you run into any problems with the new update, please reach out to us via email at mail@stepzapp.com and we will sort things out.

Thank you for using Stepz! This update includes the following improvements:

- Stepz Friends: Set your own status message that will be displayed in the friends list and your profile

- Stepz Friends: Added yesterday’s steps to all user profiles

- Widget: Added a Dark Mode option for iOS 10 (available for Stepz PRO users)

As always, please let us know what you think about the new version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting us directly via the app.

Thank you for using Stepz!

This update includes a few bugs fixes and small improvements under the hood.

Please let us know what you think about the new version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting us directly via the app.

This update includes improvements for the iPhone X.

Please let us know what you think about the new version by writing a review at the App Store or contacting us directly via the app.
This update includes a special surprise for the soccer tournament in Russia!
This update includes a special surprise for the soccer tournament in Russia!

Hi Stepzers, Steppers and all the people who like to walk!
After several months of development, we are delighted to introduce the brand new Stepz! Fully renovated, from head to toes.
Hurry up, update it now and let us know what you think with a review!

Hi Stepzers, Steppers and all the people who like to walk! After several months of development, we are delighted to introduce the brand new Stepz! Fully renovated, from head to toes. Hurry up, update it now and let us know what you think with a review!

Hi dears!
YES, we did it, we FINALLY fixed the data bug - your precious steps are all back home, day by day.
Sorry for the inconvenience!
With love,
Stepz team

Hello Stepperz!
We are working hard to bring you a better version of Steps so here is one more fix for you!
Sorry if your walking was interrupted, now you can keep going!

With love,
Steps team

Hello dear Stepz users!

We have been working really hard to bring you a new update that fixes your data-related issues. Your feedback keeps us moving, so please tell us if you encounter other problems.

This update also contains a few enhancements and fixes as well:
- you will now be able to either personalise your step length or to have it automatically set by the app;
- if you miss some data from the past now you can reimport it from Health App, please make sure you have integration enabled;
- the automatic goal doesn't have a cap anymore, so you are pushed towards your goal even more;
- we improved the icon badge function;
- the widget automatically updates to the data of the new day after midnight;
- changing the metric system is also instantaneous.

More updates and improvements are coming and we are also working on the possibility to use a style more similar to the previous version of the app. Stay tuned!

PS: Our customer support will help you with anything you may need. Contact us straight away in case of need and remember not to cancel the app!

This update also contains a few enhancements and fixes as well:
- you will now be able to either personalise your step length or to have it automatically set by the app;
- if you miss some data from the past now you can reimport it from Health App, please make sure you have integration enabled;
- the automatic goal doesn't have a cap anymore, so you are pushed towards your goal even more;
- we improved the icon badge function;
- the widget automatically updates to the data of the new day after midnight;
- changing the metric system is also instantaneous.

More updates and improvements are coming and we are also working on the possibility to use a style more similar to the previous version of the app. Stay tuned!

PS: Our customer support will help you with anything you may need. Contact us straight away in case of need and remember not to cancel the app!

In this version we added new achievements for you with brand new badges. Keep walking and earn them all!

Hello people of Stepz!

A major update is here, in which we:
- updated the Dashboard to make it easier for you to see all your most important metrics at glance;
- improved the colours of the Dashboard;
- made the 7-day average way more accessible;
- fixed a few bugs;
- added new achievements, and made the old ones prettier.

Keep walking!
